title: The Writer's Almanac - Sunday, February 16, 2020
description: It's the birthday of the printer Giambattista Bodoni (Italy, 1740), namesake of the popular typeface Bodoni. He personally designed around 300 typefaces.
itunes:author: Prairie Home Productions
itunes:subtitle: It's the birthday of the printer Giambattista Bodoni (Italy, 1740), namesake of the popular typeface Bodoni. He personally designed around 300 typefaces.
